attributes.action: To strongly condemn the BBC’s biased decision to block a TV fundraising appeal on Gaza initiated by the Disasters Emergency Committee (DEC) and to reverse the decision.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has blocked a DEC appeal to raise funds for Gaza after 22 days of Israel's onslaught. The appeal was expected to raise at least £10m which is desperately needed as emergency aid which is supported by UNWRA.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
